name: Julie Berry's Testimonial
para: This is a great app! I love using it as it is very simple to navigate.

name: David Wilmont's Testimonial
para: A fantastic and useful idea for an app, it is featured on my home page as it is very useful to me!

name: Donna McKay's Testimonial
para: I found this app to be excellent as I can now keep track of my volunteer hours, they add up quickly!
